text: Burbage go as it had been a pleasant day
in the summer sunshine then suddenly
everything changed the skies opened at a
freak storm pelted the erstwhile Sun
worshipers with giant hailstones those
in the sea ran for the shore many
clearly and pain from the pattering they
were receiving others thought what cover
they heard some huddled together under
beach umbrellas which offered little in
the way of protection
it was another 15 minutes before the
onslaught eventually subsided Russia has
been experiencing extreme weather all
summer many central areas have had snow
and freezing temperatures at a lakeside
resort not far from Novosibirsk two
girls died when a tree fell on their
tent as they sheltered from the latest
storm the authorities have begun an
investigation John brain BBC News
